ItemDesc: An unusual shield embedded with ambers mined from beyond the skies. Used to level up Traces significantly for <color=#f29e38ff>Preservation</color> characters.
ItemBGDesc: The wielder of this shield is seemingly protected by an invisible shield wall, immune to fiery arrows or mountainous claws. Ancient legends entail a war where a tribal hero wielding a bronze shield charged to their death against a Leviathan, together with warriors armed with fiery spears. This shield is a witness to that war. "Do not cross the line."
